wikipedia_page.main: Harold Lloyd (12 March 1920 – 1984) was a Welsh footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Flint Town, Tranmere Rovers and Runcorn. He made 203 appearances for Tranmere.

response: Harold Lloyd (1893–1971) was an American film actor and producer
* Harold Lloyd Jr. (1931-1971), American actor and singer, son of Harold Lloyd
